about_the_game:
A new 2D action game is coming!




Rush! is a 2D action game exclusively for one player who fights together with 100 virtual friends.
The data of players from all over the world collected on the server is reflected on the game screen, allowing players to play while cooperating with up to 100 virtual friends at the same time!　This game is just like a commuter "rush" game.
Enjoy the unprecedented sense of fun and excitement of a jam-packed game with an excessive amount of information on the screen!

You fight against extraterrestrials!　They parasitize insects and heavy machinery, grow huge, and attack without mercy!　Fight them with the latest human weapons and an overwhelming number of 100 friends!


Game description

Rush! is a Metroidvania-like action game in which you advance with 100 friends!
Move left, right, jump, and shoot to destroy enemies as you progress through an area that resembles an ant's nest. Gradually, skills will be released and you will be able to do more and more.
Whether it's a difficult action area, an area with hidden rooms and riddles to solve, or an area with bosses, having 100 friends will surely help you.


Game Features

The most important feature of "Rush!" is that you can fight with up to 100 virtual friends!


What is a Ghost Player?
Your play data will be sent to the server. At the same time, 100 play data from all over the world will be randomly sent to your world. The players from this server are called Ghost Players.


Comments from the creators
It has been my dream to create a game with an original IP, so I am very happy to have had the chance to develop this game.
This game is a 2D side-scrolling action game, which I also love.
I added the essence of "adventuring with 100 ghost players" to those gameplay elements. I hope to deliver a new experience.
Also, I am trying my best to create a game that can be enjoyed by those who do not usually play action games.

We look forward to your support for Rush! We look forward to your support for "Rush!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Big Sur
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz 6コアIntel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB 2400 MHz DDR4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 560X 4 GB,Radeon Pro 560X 4 GB
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended

name: Rush! - Red Horizon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended

short_description: Rush! is a single-player 2D action game that lets you battle with up to 100 virtual friends. Enjoy an unprecedented sense of fun and excitement in a crowded environment with an excessive amount of on-screen information!
